h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: He can also use simple claw swipes, which more often than not will create more lightning spots that detonate after a short delay. Always dodge to the opposite side of his swipe so you can retaliate with attacks and not get shocked.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
He can also use simple claw swipes, which more often than not will create more lightning spots that detonate after a short delay. Always dodge to the opposite side of his swipe so you can retaliate with attacks and not get shocked.
